ADD_TO_CART_MUTATION.mutation: mutation AddToCart($productId: String!, $color: String, $size: String, $quantity: Int!, $capacity: String, $usbPort: String, $touchId: String) { addToCart(productID: $productId, color: $color, size: $size, quantity: $quantity, capacity: $capacity, usb_port: $usbPort, touch_id: $touchId) { cartitemID productID name price_per_unit quantity currency_symbol color size capacity first_image usb_port touch_id } }

UPDATE_CART_ITEM_MUTATION.mutation: mutation UpdateCartItem($cartitemId: Int!, $quantity: Int!) { UpdateCartItem(cartitemID: $cartitemId, quantity: $quantity) }
